snippet: Often, professionals are judged by the amount of time they spend at the office. But that gauge can be at odds with workplace efficiency.
abstract: Professionals are often judged by their companies by the amount of time they spend at the office, but that gauge can be at odds with workplace efficiency; general ways are discussed on how professionals across all industries can improve their efficiency.
lead_paragraph: Often, professionals are judged by the amount of time they spend at the office. But that gauge can be at odds with workplace efficiency.

headline.seo: Measure Results, Not Hours, to Improve Work Efficiency
headline.main: They Work Long Hours, but What About Results?
headline.print_headline: They Work Long Hours, But What About Results?
